languages.text: "Спасибо за чистосердечное признание. Штабу будет интересно узнать о ваших криминальных схемах".
"Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."
languages.original_text: "Спасибо за чистосердечное признание. Штабу будет интересно узнать о ваших криминальных схемах".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."
"Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."
"Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."
"Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."
"Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

languages.text: 「率直に言ってくれてありがとうな。司令部はお前の犯罪計画について聞くのに興味津々だろう」
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: 「率直に言ってくれてありがとうな。司令部はお前の犯罪計画について聞くのに興味津々だろう」

languages.text: "Danke für Euer offenes Geständnis. Das Hauptquartier wird an Euren verbrecherischen Plänen sehr interessiert sein."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Euer offenes Geständnis. Das Hauptquartier wird an Euren verbrecherischen Plänen sehr interessiert sein."

languages.text: "Dürüst itirafınız için teşekkürler. Karargâh, suçlarınızı dinlemekle pek ilgilenecektir."
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: "Dürüst itirafınız için teşekkürler. Karargâh, suçlarınızı dinlemekle pek ilgilenecektir."

languages.text: «Gracias por su confesión sincera. A los del cuartel general les interesará conocer sus conjuras criminales».
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por su confesión sincera. A los del cuartel general les interesará conocer sus conjuras criminales».

languages.text: “感谢你的坦诚，总部一定会对你的犯罪计划很感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: “感谢你的坦诚，总部一定会对你的犯罪计划很感兴趣。”

languages.text: « Merci pour votre candide confession. Je connais des gens au quartier général qui seront ravis d'en apprendre plus sur vos projets criminels. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your candid confession. Headquarters will be interested to hear about your criminal schemes."

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre candide confession. Je connais des gens au quartier général qui seront ravis d'en apprendre plus sur vos projets criminels. »
